definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: A stalagmite is below a stalactite and they both grow, eventually to meet.
sentences.chinese: 石筍在鐘乳石下面，它們二者都在增長，最終會合。

sentences.english: After switching on powerful arc lights, they saw great stalagmites.
sentences.chinese: 他們打開強力弧光燈，看見一株株巨大的石筍。

sentences.english: However, The quantitative interpretation for stable isotope in speleothem needs further research.
sentences.chinese: 洞穴石筍穩定同位素的定量解譯尚需進一步研究。

sentences.english: Groups of spotted eagle rays cruise around the pinnacles.
sentences.chinese: 斑點鷹魟成羣結隊在石筍周圍漫遊。

sentences.english: We also spent about 5 minutes before climbing to the peak under the stalagmite .
sentences.chinese: 我們還花了大約5分鐘，然後爬至山頂的石筍。

sentences.english: Stalagmites and stalactites? You never know when those school lessons will come in handy.
sentences.chinese: 石筍和鐘乳石？你才知道學校的課程在哪兒能用上。

sentences.english: Once a stalactite and a stalagmite are connected, then it is called a column.
sentences.chinese: 當鐘乳石與石筍連在一起，稱之爲圓柱。

sentences.english: There is about 10 meters between the Stalagmites and the ridge cliff, which are severely confronted with each other.
sentences.chinese: 石筍與山脊峭壁相距寬10餘米，兩壁相峙十分險峻。

sentences.english: Legend has it to shoot elephants for food, should be as stalagmites and Health.
sentences.chinese: 相傳大象以筍爲食，石筍應象而生。

sentences.english: Most of the stalactites and stalagmites have their own names.
sentences.chinese: 多數鐘乳石和石筍都有自己的名字。

sentences.english: A stalagmite. The cave is full of them.
sentences.chinese: 石筍，這個洞穴裏隨處可見。

definition: scattered about like stars in the sky or chess pieces on a board (idiom); spread all over the place
